snippet.title: Water - Half Life 2 mod (Complete Playthrough)
snippet.description:
A third person, short RPG, more adventure mod for Half Life 2. I think of it as an adventure/point and click. Pretty impressive.
This is the only mod where an arm in a toilet means nothing. No fs given.

www.moddb.com/mods/water
